title: SUPER STREETFIGHTER IV ARCADE EDITION
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese.  (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)   Street Fighter IV took the world by storm and now itâ€™s back, and more Super than ever with Super Street Fighter IV! Ten new fighters, nostalgic Bonus Stages, new spectator features and the awesome Replay Channel will draw you in for one more brutal fight!

childDownloads.title: 2014 Challengers Costume Pack
childDownloads.description: Alternate costume pack for Decapre, Elena, Hugo, Poison, and Rolento in Ultra Street Fighter IV. Note: This content is only for use in Ultra Street Fighter IV.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: 2014 Challengers Vacation Pack
childDownloads.description: Alternate costume pack for Ultra Street Fighter IV. Contains new vacation themed outfits for Rolento, Elena, Poison, Hugo, and Decapre. Wear these new threads and take out your opponents in style! *This content is only compatible with Ultra Street Fighter IV. Will not work with any other game.

childDownloads.title: 2014 Costume Compatibility Pack
childDownloads.description: Download this compatibility pack to see your opponents' alternate costumes from the 2014 Challengers Costume Pack! Note: This content is only for use in Ultra Street Fighter IV. This is a compatibility pack - it does not allow you to use the alternate costumes.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: SSFIV Animated Trailer
childDownloads.description: Download the official Super Street Fighter IV animated trailer! The trailer features Juri, the right-hand of Seth, as she delves into the affairs of the world's greatest fighters. Directed by the world-renowned Fuminori Kizaki, this is one trailer you do not want to miss! The real fight begins now!

childDownloads.title: SSFIV ARCADE EDITION
childDownloads.description: Feel the excitement of the arcades with SSFIV ARCADE EDITION! Play as one of four new characters: Yun, Yang, Evil Ryu and Oni! Follow top players, view the Elite Channel, and check out the revamped My Channel! You can even play against people who have not yet purchased SSFIV ARCADE EDITION!  This downloadable content is for Super Street Fighter IV only. It cannot be played as a standalone title. You cannot use SSFIV ARCADE EDITION characters against users who have not purchased this content. This content is the same as the retail version of Super Street Fighter IV Arcade Edition.

childDownloads.title: SSFIV Gamerpic Pack 1
childDownloads.description: Download the first Super Street Fighter IV Gamerpic Pack! Included in this set are Juri, T.Hawk, Dee Jay, Adon and Cody! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
